file_content.text: I've got something for you. Transmitting now.
Now what have we here...? Oh, this is better than I could have hoped! I might even convince the Voss to hand her over for trial with this!
Are you putting me on standby?
Where's that leave me?
You've done everything you can out there, better we not tempt fate.
Pull that off and I might kiss you.
That'd be great.
Let's try to not get carried away.
Don't even think about taking credit for this.
You mean hand her over to me.
If your actions here lead to General Redrish's downfall, you'll have more than earned your due.
I'll handle things from here. Return to my office and lay low until I return.
[The communications equipment has suffered from cursory sabotage. Cords of detonite sit around the console waiting to be wired.]
Why soldiers pull apart and leave all good parts behind?
Blizz. See what you can do with this.
I need this terminal working.
This easy. Blizz have ready for boss in no time.
Computer work much better now that Blizz get dirt out of the way.
I'll take it from here.
Bet it works better than it ever did.
Great job.
Blizz safe bet, make anything better for boss.
There was gunk in the console?
What dirt?
Blizz find lots of putty with wires stuck in. Blizz clean, made big ball.
Hard to work when you're dead.
They never had time to finish.
Oh... boss have good point.
Quit nosing around before you blow us sky high.
Don't touch anything.
Blizz not nose around, only looking. Hmph.
Looks like they were making for a quick exit.
Help me find some replacements parts.
I need this terminal working.
You know how to handle that stuff, right?
Not quick enough.
They needed practice.
Be glad. If they'd been any faster, we might be having this conversation a hundred meters deeper.
I don't suppose you know anything about demolitions.
Any good with bombs?
I know enough to outsource to someone with fewer fingers.
Whatcha want with that trash?
Keep your distance.
I wanna be sure it won't blow.
'Fraid of a little bomb? Ain't even got a detonator.
Not trash. Pay dirt.
Could be info in the memory.
Says you. Don't keep me waitin' to get back to the murderin' part.
Just shut up and hold the camera.
I'm going to search it, moron.
Wanna see what gettin' crushed looks like from another angle?
It looks worse than it is; they were counting on the explosives to finish the job.
I want to know what they were hoping to cover up.
Get it running.
Might take me a little while to clear out the detonite, but the console should only be a couple minutes.
Piece of cake. It's all yours.
What would I ever do without you?
[Flirt] Good job.
Probably kick it a few times and curse a lot.
Nice work, Mako.
Good job.
Ah, you probably could have handled it without me.
Am I supposed to be impressed? Move over.
You waiting for a compliment?
Anything to help.
Finish nothing, there's enough detonite here to atomize their entire camp.
They were going for overkill.
Right... maybe you should take a look at this.
[The terminal appears to be repairable.]
Keep real still while I check this out.
[Inspect the detonite.]
I'd rather get a head start running.
I won't sneeze if you won't.
Or they were hoping we'd get sloppy and blow ourselves to bits.
Could be a trap.
Wouldn't put it past them, but I don't think they got that far.
Find something?
Holoterminal. They wanted it destroyed.
Maybe.
Worth a look.
This look rigged to blow to you?
I need your trap expertise.
This was to cover tracks, not kill.
Disarm the bombs. I want what's on that terminal.
Clear out this detonite. ASAP.
Understood.
All clear. Try it.
Let's see if your work paid off.
Time to poke around.
I know who to call the next time the carbonite canister's screwed too tight.
[Flirt] I like a handy man.
I'd call the Houk.
You know where I bunk.
Nice work, kid.
Good job.
Learned to crawl in mine fields.
About time you finished.
Better bored than dead.
[The terminal appears to be repairable.]
Let's see who you've been talking to.
[Attempt repairs]
Enough compound here to widen this hole by another kilometer.
[Inspect the detonite]
[It appears that the detonite was never intended to act as a trap, only to ensure that the equipment would be obliterated.]
More wires... just what I needed.
[Remove the charges]
[Of the charges placed, only a small number appear to be wired and are easily disconnected.]
[After replacing some cables and restoring power, the holoterminal flickers to life.]
Hawk's Nest compromised. Full retreat. Operation Cave-in underway. Final transmission. Harrier One out.
Harrier One to Peregrine, the garrison at Fort Kodentha appears to be sending out patrols of Imperial troops.
Flights recalled and circling. What's the situation, General? Please advise.
Peregrine... has to be General Redrish.
Harrier One, expect more. Yoran's convinced the Voss to allow Imperial troops to bolster Voss-Ka's defenses against the Gormak.
Monitor their patrols. If they stray too far, show the Voss how ill-prepared Imperials are for "Gormak" attacks. Peregrine out.
This what boss was looking for?
They'd never have made it in the crime game, that's for sure... you know, if they'd made it at all.
Seen a lotta cons get booked on less.
That'll teach them not to scrub the drives.
Got her.
